DOC.brief_summary: The objective experimental study compare electromyographic response sedentary youth without administration static stretch neural mobilization . The sample compose sedentary student , divide , randomly , neural mobilization practitioner ( NMG ; n=15 ; age=22±3 year ) , static stretch practitioner ( SSG ; n=15 ; age=23±4 year ) control group ( CG ; n=15 ; age : 24±4 year ) . For evaluation , electromyograph ( EMG ; four channel system ) use monitor electrical activity femoral bicep muscle ) . In neural mobilization , hip flexion conduct passively knee extend , 30 plantar-to-dorsal flexion oscillation complete per minute . For static stretching , hip flexion complete passively knee extend hold 6 second . The perception effort evaluate use Perceived Force Flexibility Scale . The statistical significance level p < 0.05 . Descriptive statistic average , standard deviation , median , standard error absolute change within group ( post-test - pretest ) calculate . The sample normality evaluate use Shapiro-Wilk test . For response variable analysis , pair Student 's t-test ( pair ) Wilcoxon test ( nonparametric ) use intragroup analysis . For intergroup analysis , multivariate analysis variance ( ANOVA ) test use , follow Tukey Post-Hoc test . A p < 0.05 significance level adopt statistical evaluation . Microsoft Excel Statistical Package Social Science ( SPSS ) version 14.0 used evaluation result .
DOC.brief_title: Electromyographic Responses Static Stretching Neural Mobilization
DOC.detailed_description: This study approve Committee Ethics Research Humans Faculty Medical Sciences ( FACIME ) ( protocol number 145/09 ) . The group include student absence neural , muscular skeletal-associated problem non-obese , accord establish body mass index ( BMI ) criterion . Participants exclude metabolic disease neuro-musculo-skeletal problem , practice certain physical activity , present pain maintenance position electromyographic response collection otherwise fulfill term agreement researcher . In first stage , researcher conduct anamnesis individual obtain information dietary habit ( Vasconcelos , 1995 ) , medicine use , pathological history physical activity , accord Baecke Questionnaire ( Florindo , Latorre , 2003 ) . In second stage , subject ' height body mass measure body mass index ( BMI ) evaluation use Filizola 0-150 kg clinical scale ( precision 0.1 kg ) mechanical 0-190 cm stadiometer ( precision 0.5 cm ) , follow recommendation International Society Advancement Kinanthropometry ( Marfell-Jonnes et al. , 2006 ) . For electromyography measurement , subject position dorsal decubitus São Paulo Institute ( ISP ) model 4040 couch , researcher perform hip flexion knee extension tissue resistance , point volunteer report sensation `` discomfort combine pain '' press trigger button , signal record 2 second point . The speed movement make slow gradual , , accord report Tanaka Farah ( 2007 ) , degree range motion , great stretch speed generate high impulse frequency afferent fiber near terminal , intense reflex response promote . The electrical activity femoral bicep muscle right thigh record four channel EMG system use superficial bipolar active electrode ( pre-amplified ) acquisition software signal processing . The sampling frequency 2,000 Hz , amplifier high-pass filter 20 Hz low-pass filter 500 Hz ; 12-bit analogical converter computer complete system . In intervention ( SSG NMG ) , perception strength evaluate use Perceived Strength Flexibility Scale ( PERFLEX ) present five level intensity , vary 0 110 , five correspond verbal descriptor , evaluate individual point description perception correspond amplitude movement perform . In SSG group , subject position dorsal decubitus , researcher perform hip flexion knee extend passively hold 30 second ; type stretch corresponds maintenance increase amplitude posture , without surpass maximum movement limit , three time interval 10 second repetition ( Nelson Bandy , 2005 ) . In NMG group , subject position dorsal decubitus , researcher perform hip flexion knee extend passively perform 30 oscillation plantar-to-dorsal flexion one minute . In SSG group , subject position dorsal decubitus , researcher perform hip flexion knee extend passively hold 30 second ; type stretch corresponds maintenance increase amplitude posture , without surpass maximum movement limit , three time interval 10 second repetition ( Nelson Bandy , 2005 ) . In NMG group , subject position dorsal decubitus , researcher perform hip flexion knee extend passively perform 30 oscillation plantar-to-dorsal flexion one minute .
DOC.criteria: student absence neural , muscular skeletalassociated problem nonobese , accord establish body mass index metabolic disease neuromusculoskeletal problem , practice certain physical activity , present pain maintenance position electromyographic response collection otherwise fulfill term agreement researcher .
